documentation.text:
@notice Thrown if the address will not lead to the specified hook calls being called
 @param hooks The address of the hooks contract
@notice Hook did not return its selector
@notice thrown when a hook call fails
@notice The hook's delta changed the swap from exactIn to exactOut or vice versa

@notice performs a hook call using the given calldata on the given hook that doesnt return a delta
 @return result The complete data returned by the hook

@notice performs a hook call using the given calldata on the given hook
 @return delta The delta returned by the hook
@notice modifier to prevent calling a hook if they initiated the action

typeDescriptions.typeString: function IHooks.beforeInitialize(address,struct PoolKey calldata,uint160,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4)

documentation.text: @notice calls beforeInitialize hook if permissioned and validates return value

typeDescriptions.typeString: function IHooks.afterInitialize(address,struct PoolKey calldata,uint160,int24,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4)

documentation.text: @notice calls afterInitialize hook if permissioned and validates return value

typeDescriptions.typeString: function IHooks.beforeRemoveLiquidity(address,struct PoolKey calldata,struct IPoolManager.ModifyLiquidityParams calldata,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4)
function IHooks.beforeAddLiquidity(address,struct PoolKey calldata,struct IPoolManager.ModifyLiquidityParams calldata,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4)

documentation.text: @notice calls beforeModifyLiquidity hook if permissioned and validates return value

typeDescriptions.typeString: function IHooks.afterRemoveLiquidity(address,struct PoolKey calldata,struct IPoolManager.ModifyLiquidityParams calldata,BalanceDelta,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4,BalanceDelta)
function IHooks.afterAddLiquidity(address,struct PoolKey calldata,struct IPoolManager.ModifyLiquidityParams calldata,BalanceDelta,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4,BalanceDelta)

documentation.text: @notice calls afterModifyLiquidity hook if permissioned and validates return value

typeDescriptions.typeString: function IHooks.beforeSwap(address,struct PoolKey calldata,struct IPoolManager.SwapParams calldata,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4,BeforeSwapDelta,uint24)

documentation.text: @notice calls beforeSwap hook if permissioned and validates return value

typeDescriptions.typeString: function IHooks.afterSwap(address,struct PoolKey calldata,struct IPoolManager.SwapParams calldata,BalanceDelta,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4,int128)

documentation.text: @notice calls afterSwap hook if permissioned and validates return value

typeDescriptions.typeString: function IHooks.beforeDonate(address,struct PoolKey calldata,uint256,uint256,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4)

documentation.text: @notice calls beforeDonate hook if permissioned and validates return value

typeDescriptions.typeString: function IHooks.afterDonate(address,struct PoolKey calldata,uint256,uint256,bytes calldata) returns (bytes4)

documentation.text: @notice calls afterDonate hook if permissioned and validates return value
@notice bubble up revert if present. Else throw FailedHookCall

@notice V4 decides whether to invoke specific hooks by inspecting the lowest significant bits of the address that
 the hooks contract is deployed to.
 For example, a hooks contract deployed to address: 0x0000000000000000000000000000000000002400
 has the lowest bits '10 0100 0000 0000' which would cause the 'before initialize' and 'after add liquidity' hooks to be used.
